PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2023-01502023-02-16PWGSC
ActCanada Post Corporation Act
PrecisRe-appointment of SUROMITRA SANATANI of Vancouver, British Columbia, as Chairperson of the Board of Directors of the Canada Post Corporation, to hold office during pleasure for a term of three years, effective June 1, 2023.
AttachmentsAttachment
precis: Re-appointment of SUROMITRA SANATANI of Vancouver, British Columbia, as Chairperson of the Board of Directors of the Canada Post Corporation, to hold office during pleasure for a term of three years, effective June 1, 2023.
